name: Campfire Simulator
description:
A game about relaxation. There are no zombies to kill, achievements or points to collect, the only goal is to forget about the problems of every day life and be a campfire for a moment.

Listen to nature and the calming sound of the river or the crickets in the forest with a combination of a relaxing piano music, because this is the best campfire simulator to date!

p. s.: Look at the ZIP's file size... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
